snippet: The Huatong Road and Bridge Group Company said that it would not be able to make payments on a bond because of an inquiry into its chief executive.
lead_paragraph: The Huatong Road and Bridge Group Company said that it would not be able to make payments on a bond because of an inquiry into its chief executive.

headline.main: Chinese Company Warns of Debt Default

keywords.value: Huatong Road and Bridge Group Co
